quotes.text: The magic of Christmas is in the hearts of us all.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.text: Christmas is joy found in giving, not in receiving.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.text: The joy of Christmas is not in the presents but in our hearts.
quotes.author: W.T. Ellis

quotes.text: Christmas is the moment when hope and love come together.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Wouldn't it be wonderful if every day were Christmas?
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.text: Christmas isn't a season. It's a feeling.
quotes.author: Edna Ferber

quotes.text: Christmas is the day that holds all time together.
quotes.author: Alexander Smith

quotes.text: The best way to spread Christmas cheer is singing loud for all to hear.
quotes.author: Buddy the Elf (Movie 'Elf')

quotes.text: Love the giver more than the gift.
quotes.author: Brigham Young

quotes.text: Peace on earth will come to stay, when we live Christmas every day.
quotes.author: Helen Steiner Rice
